files.description: Node.js script that runs the pipeline twice, computes SHA256 hashes for all artifacts under outputs/, compares runs and/or validates against outputs/hashes.json, and exits nonzero on any mismatch for CI/CD or local use.

Summary: Wrote a CI-friendly reproducibility check script that runs the pipeline twice, hashes outputs deterministically, and fails on mismatches and/or expected-hash regressions.

files.description: Node.js helper script that deterministically enumerates files in outputs/ and writes a stable outputs/hashes.json mapping of relative paths to SHA256 hashes to support regression checks.

"scripts/run_experiment.py", "scripts/run_pipeline.py", "scripts/run_pipeline.sh", "scripts/run_tests_and_capture_log.py", "scripts/run_tests_capture_env_and_log.py", "scripts/update_outputs_index.py", "scripts/verify_test_artifacts.py"]
SUMMARY: Added a deterministic Node.js helper script to hash all outputs/ artifacts into a stable outputs/hashes.json mapping for reproducible regression checks.

files.description: GitHub Actions workflow that runs the project pipeline and then executes the reproducibility check to fail CI on non-reproducible outputs or hash regressions.

SUMMARY: Added a GitHub Actions workflow that runs the pipeline and then enforces reproducibility by invoking the reproducibility check script in CI.

missionDescription: Add a reproducibility step to CI/local make target: run the pipeline twice, compare SHA256 hashes of artifacts in ./outputs/, and fail if mismatched; store the expected hashes in-repo (or in ./outputs/hashes.json) to support regression checks.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker
Curated insight (actionability 8-9/10): Implements reproducibility as an automated gate using hashes, preventing non-deterministic drift and creating reliable execution/test evidence....
